statement.tex: \\ \text{If }9x^2 + 6x + 5 = t^2 + a^2, \text{ then what} \\ \text{are }t = ? \text{ and } a = ?
\\ \text{Which of the following shows the }\\ \text{integral correctly calculated?}

reason.tex: (3x+1)^2 = 9x^2 + 6x + 1 \text{ - which is almost}\\ \text{equal to }9x^2+6x+5.\text{ In fact, }9x^2+6x+5\\ = (3x+1)^2 + 4 = (3x+1)^2 + 2^2.\\ \text{Therefore, } t = (3x+1)\text{ and } a = 2.
